name: SHAHID KING-MD
description: JAVASCRIPT WHATSAPP BOT PROJECT POWERD BY SHAHID KING ♥️

ALIVE_IMG.description: paste your image url if you don't have you can use this public url.

PREFIX.description: paste your bot prefix note! Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: select your bot work type public-private-inbox-group.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Make it true if you want bot auto voice.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want bot auto reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want bot auto sticker.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Make it true if you want bot auto auto_read_status.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want bot auto remove group link.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want bot auto delete bad words from group example xxx porn etc.

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: type here log if you want detected antidelete in conn.id.

FAKE_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want bot fake record.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want bot AutoReact.

HEART_REACT.description: Make it true if you want bot only heart ♥️ emjois reaction .

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want bot read your all sms just now.

CAPTION.description: enter your caption if you want to show on menu.

STATUS_REPLY.description: enter your caption if you want to show on status reply.
STATUS_REPLY.value: 🂱 𝐘𝐎𝐔𝐑 𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐓𝐔𝐒 𝐒𝐄𝐄𝐍 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐋𝐈𝐊𝐄 𝐉𝐔𝐒𝐓 𝐍𝐎𝐖 𝐖𝐈𝐀 𝐒𝐇𝐀𝐇𝐈𝐃 𝐊𝐈𝐍𝐆-𝐌𝐃 🂱

AUTO_REPLY_STATUS.description: you can true or false it.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: make it true if you want to show always online.

FAKE_TYPING.description: make it true if you want to show fake typing.

CURRENT_STATUS.description: make it true if you to show your reail last seen.

READ_CMD.description: make it true if you want bot auto read commands

STATUS_REACT.description: make it true if you want to show on status react.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: replace it with your own number.

OWNER_NAME.description: replace it with your own name.

INBOX_BLOCK.description: make it true if you sure you want to block inbox user.

ANTI_CALL.description: Make it true if you want bot automatically decline your call.

BAD_NUMBER_BLOCKER.description: Make it true if you want bot auto block bad numbers example 263 or 212.
